title: India U19 vs England U19, 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights: England U19 229/7 At Stumps
description: India U19 Vs England U19, 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights: Combined bowling effort helped India U19 reduce England U19 to 229 for 7.
excerpt: India U19 Vs England U19, 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights: Combined bowling effort helped India U19 reduce England U19 to 229 for 7.
text: IND-U19 vs ENG-U19 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights© X (Twitter) India U19 Vs England U19, 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights: Combined bowling effort helped India U19 reduce England U19 to 229 for 7 at Day 1 Stumps in the ongoing second Youth Test at Chelmsford. Aditya Rawat, RS Ambrish and Naman Pushpak shared two wickets apiece while Henil Patel scalped one. It was a top-order failure for the hosts before captain Thomas Rew and Ekansh Singh scored fighting fifties. Rew hit 59 while Ekansh smashed 66 not out. html:
IND-U19 vs ENG-U19 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights© X (Twitter)

India U19 Vs England U19, 2nd Youth Test Day 1 Highlights: Combined bowling effort helped India U19 reduce England U19 to 229 for 7 at Day 1 Stumps in the ongoing second Youth Test at Chelmsford. Aditya Rawat, RS Ambrish and Naman Pushpak shared two wickets apiece while Henil Patel scalped one. It was a top-order failure for the hosts before captain Thomas Rew and Ekansh Singh scored fighting fifties. Rew hit 59 while Ekansh smashed 66 not out. (Scorecard)

Here are the Highlights of India U19 vs England U19, 2nd Youth Test Day 1 -
